name: ImperfectRepeat
0:
”Alexa, ask imperfect repeat to say I love my shirt”
”Alexa, ask imperfect repeat to repeat toy boats”
”Alexa, ask imperfect repeat to say four score and seven years ago”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: imperfect repeat
des: Ask Alexa to repeat a word or a phrase and enjoy as it struggles and fails to accurately repeat what you have said.
